department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Purchase of emergency generator sets for CCG 1200 Medium Icebreaker Vessels
full_summary:
**Title**
F7049-230030 Emergency Generator Sets for CCG Medium Icebreaker Vessels

**English Title**
F7049-230030 Emergency Generator Sets for CCG Medium Icebreaker Vessels


**Procurement Details**
• **Reference Number**: WS4089023936-Doc4089232242
• **Amendment Number**: 4
• **Solicitation Number**: WS4089023936
• **Publication Date**: 7 July 2023
• **Tender Closing Date**: 31 August 2023 14:00 EDT
• **Amendment Date**: 4 August 2023
• **Expected Contract Start Date**: 18 August 2023
• **Expected Contract End Date**: 31 August 2027

**Notice Information**
This tender has expired.

**Scope and Deliverables**
The Government is seeking a bid for the purchase of 3 (three) class-approved emergency generator sets designed specifically for the 3 (three) CCG Medium Icebreaking Vessels (1200). The successful provider will be responsible for providing a comprehensive package of documentation and technical specifications as outlined in the Annex A of this tender document.

**Important Requirements**
* The tender response must be submitted in accordance with the guidelines and instructions outlined in the ANNEX A.
* The complete bid package, including all supporting documentation, must be submitted by 2 PM EDT on 31 August 2023. Late bids will not be considered.

**Contact Details**
Ioana Novac
(novacp@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

* The above contact can be reached for further information regarding this tender.

**Bid Submission**
• Please ensure that your response is bid format as per guidelines outlined in the ANNEX A.
• All bids must be submitted through Ariba.
* Bid submission information can be found at the Discover opening at "http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16808715?extsite=MTY4MDg3MTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg=="
